LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to display a grouping of videos.

property.name: videoGalleryLink
property.label: Video Reference
property.description: Enter a supported YouTube, Brightcove or Vimeo link. For Vimeo, add a link from a channel, showcase or group. For YouTube, you can add a link from a user, channel, or playlist. For Wistia, Project Id.

property.name: hideDescriptions
property.label: Hide All Descriptions
property.description: Check this setting to hide all descriptions, even if the description fields are populated.

property.name: descriptionLineLength
property.label: Maximum Description Lines
property.description: The maximum number of lines of the description text to be displayed.

property.name: videosPerRow
property.label: Videos Per Row
property.description: When viewed on a mobile device, the row count will be stacked vertically.

property.name: apiKey
property.label: API Key
property.description: Required for YouTube,Brightcove,Wistia. Each organization using this component must obtain its own YouTube API v3 Key by registering. This process is simple and free. Please go here for more info: https://developers.google.com/youtube/registering_an_application

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: Sets the style of the component wrapper.
